description.english: Finished the game
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu.
description.spanish: Has llegado al final del juego
description.italian: Hai terminato il gioco
description.brazilian: Terminou o jogo

description.english: Finished the game assertively
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu de manière autoritaire.
description.spanish: Has llegado al final del juego por la vía asertiva
description.italian: Hai terminato il gioco assertivamente
description.brazilian: Terminou o jogo de modo assertivo

description.english: Finished the game analytically
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu de manière analytique.
description.spanish: Has llegado al final del juego por la vía analítica
description.italian: Hai terminato il gioco analiticamente
description.brazilian: Terminou o jogo de modo analítico

description.english: Finished the game empathically
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu de manière empathique.
description.spanish: Has llegado al final del juego por la vía empática
description.italian: Hai terminato il gioco empaticamente
description.brazilian: Terminou o jogo de modo empático

description.english: Unlocked a new augmentation
description.french: Vous avez débloqué une nouvelle augmentation.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado un nuevo aumento
description.italian: Hai sbloccato un nuovo potenziamento
description.brazilian: Desbloqueou um novo aprimoramento

description.english: Unlocked a full set of augmentations
description.french: Vous avez débloqué un ensemble complet d'augmentations.
description.german: Ein vollständiges Set an Augmentationen freigeschaltet.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado un conjunto completo de aumentos
description.italian: Hai sbloccato una serie completa di potenziamenti
description.brazilian: Desbloqueou um conjunto completo de aprimoramentos

displayName.french: Un goût singulier pour les singularités

description.english: Hail Huldra
description.french: Gloire à Huldra !
description.spanish: Hail Huldra
description.italian: Sia Lode a Huldra!
description.brazilian: Glória a Huldra

description.english: Wiped the mainframe with the Fenrir Protocol
description.french: Vous avez effacé l'ordinateur central à l'aide du protocole Fenrir.
description.spanish: Has barrido el ordenador central con el protocolo Fenrir
description.italian: Hai formattato il server con il Protocollo Fenrir
description.brazilian: Formatou o computador central com o protocolo Fenrir

displayName.brazilian: A família vem em primeiro lugar

description.english: Gave the child a loving home
description.french: Vous avez confié à l'enfant un foyer aimant.
description.german: Dem Kind ein liebevolles Zuhause gegeben.
description.spanish: Le has dado al bebé un buen hogar
description.italian: Hai dato al bambino una nuova casa
description.brazilian: Deu um bom lar ao bebê

description.english: Parenthood wasn't in the cards
description.french: Vous n'étiez pas faite pour être mère.
description.spanish: La maternidad no era una opción
description.italian: Essere genitore non fa per te
description.brazilian: A maternidade não estava nos planos

description.english: Mismatched augs were your cup of tea
description.french: Vous adorez les augmentations disparates.
description.german: Gemischte Augs waren genau dein Ding.
description.spanish: Te gustaba ir alternando los aumentos
description.italian: Adori i potenziamenti più disparati
description.brazilian: Preferiu usar aprimoramentos alternados

displayName.french: Murmures de la machine à soda
displayName.spanish: Susurros de una máquina de refrescos
displayName.brazilian: Sussurros de uma máquina de refrigerantes

description.english: Failed to get that hundred-year-old soda
description.french: Vous n'avez pas réussi à obtenir le soda centenaire.
description.spanish: No has logrado conseguir ese refresco centenario
description.italian: Non sei riuscito a prendere quella bibita centenaria
description.brazilian: Não conseguiu pegar aquele refri milenar

description.english: Passively smoked whatever Rolf was having
description.french: Vous avez respiré ce que fumait Rolf.
description.spanish: Has fumado pasivamente lo que sea que estuviese fumando Rolf
description.italian: Hai respirato qualsiasi cosa stesse fumando Rolf
description.brazilian: Respirou o bagulho que Rolf estava fumando

description.english: Gave Karl the finger
description.french: Vous avez rendu son doigt à Karl.
description.spanish: Le has devuelto el dedo a Karl
description.italian: Hai riconsegnato il dito a Karl
description.brazilian: Devolveu o dedo para Karl

description.english: Discovered a devious device of death
description.french: Vous avez découvert une sournoise machine de mort.
description.spanish: Has descubierto una malvada máquina mortífera
description.italian: Hai scoperto una terribile macchina mortale
description.brazilian: Descobriu uma perversa máquina mortífera

description.english: Left the recycling center in an eco-friendly fashion
description.french: Vous avez quitté l'usine de recyclage de manière écologique.
description.spanish: Has hecho del centro de reciclado un gran entorno ecológico
description.italian: Hai lasciato l'impianto di riciclaggio in condizioni eco-sostenibili
description.brazilian: Fez do centro de reciclagem um lugar que se preocupa com o meio ambiente

description.english: Prioritized installing the nutrient canister over pursuing Katarina
description.french: Vous avez préféré installer la bonbonne de nutriments plutôt que de poursuivre Katarina.
description.german: Lieber den Nährstoffkanister installiert, als Katarina zu verfolgen.
description.spanish: Has decidido instalar la lata de nutrientes en vez de perseguir a Katarina
description.italian: Hai preferito sostituire il contenitore di nutrienti piuttosto che inseguire Katarina
description.brazilian: Decidiu instalar a lata de nutrientes antes de perseguir Katarina

description.english: Gave the baby a name fit for a pet
description.french: Vous avez donné au bébé un nom d'animal de compagnie.
description.german: Dem Baby einen knuddeligen Namen gegeben.
description.spanish: Le has dado al bebé un nombre digno de una mascota
description.italian: Hai dato al bambino un nome da cane
description.brazilian: Deu ao bebê um nome digno de um mascote

description.english: Took your sweet time at the exhibition
description.french: Vous avez pris tout votre temps à l'exposition.
description.german: Viel Zeit für die Ausstellung genommen.
description.spanish: Te lo has tomado con calma en la exposición
description.italian: Ti sei preso il tuo tempo tra le sale dell'esposizione
description.brazilian: Apreciou toda a exposição

description.english: Ambushed the ambusher
description.french: Vous avez retourné l'embuscade contre son instigatrice.
description.spanish: Has emboscado a quien te emboscaba
description.italian: Hai teso un'imboscata all'imboscatrice
description.brazilian: Emboscou o emboscador

description.english: Katarina will remember that
description.french: Katarina ne risque pas de l'oublier.
description.spanish: Katarina no lo olvidará
description.italian: Katarina se lo ricorderà
description.brazilian: Katarina vai se lembrar disso

description.english: That was anti-kleptoclimactic
description.french: Vous êtes d'une honnêteté irréprochable.
description.spanish: Eso ha sido anticleptoclimático
description.italian: Tutto ciò è davvero anti-cleptomane
description.brazilian: Isso foi anticleptoclimático

displayName.french: Murmures de la machine à café
displayName.spanish: Susurros de una máquina de café
displayName.italian: Sussurri di una Macchina del Caffè
displayName.brazilian: Sussurros de uma máquina de café

description.english: Had at least one daily cup of joe
description.french: Vous avez bu au moins une tasse de café par jour.
description.german: Mindestens eine Tasse Kaffee am Tag getrunken.
description.spanish: Te has tomado al menos una taza de café al día
description.italian: Una tazza al giorno...
description.brazilian: Tomou pelo menos uma xícara de café por dia

description.english: What monster could be responsible for such a heinous crime?
description.french: Qui a bien pu commettre un crime aussi atroce ?
description.german: Wer könnte für dieses abscheuliche Verbrechen verantwortlich sein?
description.spanish: ¿Quién será responsable de un crimen tan atroz?
description.italian: Chi può aver fatto una cosa del genere?
description.brazilian: Quem será responsável por esse crime brutal?

description.english: Alex almost had his way
description.french: Alex a failli arriver à ses fins.
description.german: Alex hätte fast seinen Willen gekriegt.
description.spanish: Álex casi se sale con la suya
description.italian: Alex ce l'aveva quasi fatta
description.brazilian: Alex quase conseguiu
